DocAttribute.Name: Red
DocAttribute.Documentation: The intensity of the red colour component. > <small> NOTE& The colour component value is given within the range of 0..1, and not within the range of 0..255 as otherwise usual. </small>

DocAttribute.Name: Green
DocAttribute.Documentation: The intensity of the green colour component. > <small> NOTE&&nbs; The colour component value is given within the range of 0..1, and not within the range of 0..255 as otherwise usual. </small>

DocAttribute.Name: Blue
DocAttribute.Documentation: The intensity of the blue colour component. > <small> NOTE& The colour component value is given within the range of 0..1, and not within the range of 0..255 as otherwise usual. </small>
